instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00928: What is 820-00928? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00928</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Wont boot
threads.message:
Hello
I got a <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00928</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>, it restarts halv way when booting and restarts to question mark. It boots in safe mode but shuts down when starting to copy files, It boots normal from external drive but when tryin to copy files it shuts down. Tried in target mode and it will not copy.

No signs of water dagamage. Any ideas?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00928</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Wont boot
threads.message:
Looks like SSD issue.
Run SSD test program.

Just in case, clean J9600 contacts.
